Faults.message:
We’re very sorry for the power cut. Our teams are working hard to restore your power, however, due to weather conditions that have impacted our network, and will continue to do so through to Friday, it may take longer than normal to restore power. We’re experiencing a busier than usual period and the conditions mean that even with additional teams we have mobilised, it’s much harder to repair faults due to the safety implications of working on our network in such conditions.

We will continue to update you with the latest information here on Power Track, so we’d recommend you register for updates on this fault or check back in later.

If you are in need of extra support, such as requiring electricity for medical equipment, you can call us on 105 where our team is on hand to help.

For updates on how we’re dealing with the weather, along with helpful advice, please click here.
Faults.name: GU16 Area

Faults.message: We're sorry for the loss of supply. The reason you're currently without power is a planned outage in the areas listed. We have turned off your electricity supply to allow us to safely carry out essential work to our electrical equipment. By doing this, it'll help us to improve the reliability of our service to you for the future. If you have any questions or require more information, please call us on 105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter (@ssencommunity) with reference '205357'. You will have received a letter from us confirming your power will be interrupted with specific information relating to your property. If you did not receive this letter, you can assume your power will not be interrupted.
